content:
<rule id="apm-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="{*}applicationinsights{*}" groupId="com.microsoft.azure"/>
                    </project>
                    <file filename="applicationinsights{*}.jar"/>
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Application Performance Management (APM) tool - Application Insights">
                    <description>The application uses Application Insights.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Application Insights</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
